mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stories (user_id, content, weather, emotion, location, scope, latitude, longitude) VALUES (#{userId}, #{story.content}, #{story.weather}, #{story.emotion}, #{story.location}, #{story.scope}, #{story.latitude}, #{story.longitude})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT s.* FROM stories s JOIN follows f ON s.user_id = f.followee_id WHERE f.followee_id = #{userId} AND s.scope IN ('FOLLOWER', 'PUBLIC') UNION SELECT * FROM stories WHERE scope = 'PUBLIC') AS combined_stories GROUP BY story_id, created_at, user_id ORDER BY created_at DESC;
